notificationTypes.notificationWinner: You have been declared the winner of the match.

matchNotification.title: %{userName} wants to challenge your match of %{gameName}!

acceptChallengeModal.body: By accepting this challenge all the other challenges made to this match will be deleted.

supportScreen.placeholder: Happy? Frustrated? Sad? Share your opinion here

verificationProcessSuccess.title: Thank you!
verificationProcessSuccess.body: We got your request, this process can take 24 hrs. We appreciate your patience. We are working for you.

instructions.firstPart: Upload your clip to your profile by using the
instructions.secondPart: in the description and share us the link, just like in the image of the top ;)

uploadMatchEvidenceModal.paragraph: Remember uploading your evidence of the played match! In case of dispute for the results the evidence is your better proof!

notEnoughQaploinsModal.header: The adversary has not enough Qoins
notEnoughQaploinsModal.warning: The notification will be removed from the list

matchExpireRememberModal.paragraph: The match expires after 10 minutes if you don't accept a challenge from other user or if it's not challenged by another user.

eventDetailsModal.waitingApproval: You are still waiting for creator’s aproval ;)

eventDetailsModal.enterNickName: Enter the nickname you use to play on %{gameName}

eventDetailsModal.errorOnRequest: Registration failed, if this problem persists please write to our technical support channel on discord

eventDetailsModal.notEnoughQoinsDialogBody: Your registration could not be completed: the entry cost for this event is %{eventEntry} Qoins, you have %{qoins} Qoins.

eventDetailsModal.succedRequest: Your request has been sent :D Wait for

updateApp.header: There is a new version of Qapla, please update to the latest version.

rewardsBottomSheet.rewardsTooltip: Every donation you make fills your reward life-bar. Use your life hearts to buy from the loots :D

donationsLeaderBoard.tooltip: Earn xq points watching events marked with the xq icon on our main screen

linkTwitchAccount.description: Receive your Qoins and XQ automatically when you redeem points from your streamer's channel.

skipLinkTwitchAccount.reminder: We remind you that accounts not linked to Twitch will not be able to receive their channel exchanges 😭
skipLinkTwitchAccount.description: But don't worry, you can always link your account from your profile 😉

long.long3: Those are a lot of words,

secondPart.secondPart2: will love your support very much.

LevelInformationModal.bodyTextOne: Raise your level each season by accumulating XQ and mine more Qoins in the streams you participate in.
LevelInformationModal.bodyTextTwo: Your level from the last season determines the amount of Qoins you mine per stream.
